snippet.title: Alone in the Dark | Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
Uncover the truth about Alone in the Dark – if you dare.

A love letter to the ground-breaking original, Alone in the Dark invites you to return to Derceto Manor as either Emily Hartwood (Jodie Comer) or Edward Carnby (David Harbour) and experience a reimagination of the cult classic horror game that set the benchmark for an entire genre.

Need more evidence? Play the free Prologue right now!

Alone in the Dark is OUT NOW on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S. 

- Links & Info -  
Steam: https://thqn.net/aitd-steam 
PS5: https://thqn.net/aitd-psn
Xbox Series: https://thqn.net/aitd-xbox
Website: https://aloneinthedark.com  
Discord: https://discord.gg/aloneinthedark 

- Our Socials -  
YouTube: https://youtube.com/THQNordic  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AITDGame 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/aloneinthedarkgame 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/thqnordic  
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@thqnordic  
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/thqnordic  

#AloneInTheDark #ReturnToDerceto
